Name: Puff Town
About the game: The game introduction This is a casual board game that requires walking by rolling dice with the goal of reaching the finish line when the catnip runs out. Game shows Click the dice with the mouse, the random number is a few characters will move a few steps. Game elements Monster:If you encounter a monster, you will be robbed of cat grass. Amusement:Amusement facilities will consume cat grass. Transportation:When a trap is encountered, it will fall back a few squares. Trap:Vehicles, encounter will advance a few grid. The cat grass:Get cat grass. Game style Cute, exquisite
